targets.query:
ContainerCpuUsageSecondsTotal
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster=="$Cluster"
| where Labels.cpu=="total"
| where Container == "cadvisor"
| extend Namespace=tostring(Labels.namespace)
| where Namespace == "$Namespace"
| extend Pod=tostring(Labels.pod)
| extend Container=tostring(Labels.container)
| where Container == ""
| extend Id = tostring(Labels.id)
| where Id endswith ".slice"
| where Namespace != ""
| invoke prom_rate()
| summarize Value=round(avg(Value)+0.0005,3) by bin(Timestamp, $__timeInterval), Namespace, Pod, Id
| extend Name=replace_regex(Pod, "(-[a-z0-9]{5})$", "")
| summarize Value=sum(Value) by bin(Timestamp, $__timeInterval), Name
| project Timestamp, Name, Value
| order by Timestamp asc

ContainerMemoryWorkingSetBytes
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Labels !has "id"
| where Cluster=="$Cluster"
| extend Namespace=tostring(Labels.namespace)
| where Namespace == "$Namespace"
| extend Pod=tostring(Labels.pod)
| extend Container=tostring(Labels.container)
| where Container != ""
| extend Value=Value
| summarize Value=avg(Value) by bin(Timestamp, $__timeInterval), Namespace, Pod, Container
| summarize Value=sum(Value) by bin(Timestamp, $__timeInterval), Namespace, Pod
| summarize Value=sum(Value) by bin(Timestamp, $__timeInterval), Namespace
| project Timestamp, Value
| order by Timestamp asc

ContainerMemoryWorkingSetBytes
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Labels !has "id"
| where Cluster=="$Cluster"
| extend Namespace=tostring(Labels.namespace)
| where Namespace == "$Namespace"
| extend Pod=tostring(Labels.pod)
| extend Container=tostring(Labels.container)
| where Container != ""
| extend Value=Value
| summarize Value=avg(Value) by bin(Timestamp, $__timeInterval), Namespace, Pod, Container
| summarize Value=sum(Value) by bin(Timestamp, $__timeInterval), Namespace, Pod
| extend Name=replace_regex(Pod, "(-[a-z0-9]{5})$", "")
| summarize Value=sum(Value) by bin(Timestamp, $__timeInterval), Name
| project Timestamp, Name, Value
| order by Timestamp asc

let buckets=50;
let binSize=toscalar(ContainerCpuUsageSecondsTotal
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster=="$Cluster"
| where Labels.cpu=="total"
| where Labels.namespace == "$Namespace"
| extend Namespace=tostring(Labels.namespace)
| extend Pod=tostring(Labels.pod)
| extend Container=tostring(Labels.container)
| where Container != ""
| invoke prom_delta()
| summarize Value=(max(Value)/60) by bin(Timestamp, 60000ms), Namespace, Pod
| summarize min(Value), max(Value), avg(Value)
| extend Diff=(max_Value - min_Value) / buckets
| project Diff);
ContainerCpuUsageSecondsTotal
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster=="$Cluster"
| where Labels.cpu=="total"
| where Labels.namespace == "$Namespace"
| extend Namespace=tostring(Labels.namespace)
| extend Pod=tostring(Labels.pod)
| extend Container=tostring(Labels.container)
| where Container != ""
| invoke prom_delta()
| summarize Value=(max(Value)/60) by bin(Timestamp, 60000ms), Namespace, Pod
| summarize Value=count() by Timestamp, Bin=round(bin(Value, toreal(binSize)), 3)
| order by Timestamp asc
| project Timestamp, tostring(Bin), Value

ContainerCpuUsageSecondsTotal
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster=="$Cluster"
| where Labels.cpu=="total"
| where Labels.namespace == "$Namespace"
| extend Namespace=tostring(Labels.namespace)
| extend Pod=tostring(Labels.pod)
| extend Container=tostring(Labels.container)
| where Container != ""
| invoke prom_delta()
| extend Name=replace_regex(Pod, "(-[a-z0-9]{5})$", "")
| summarize Value=avg(Value/60), Count=dcount(Pod) by bin(Timestamp, 60000ms), Namespace, Name
| summarize Pods=max(Count), P50=round(percentile(Value, 0.5),3), P99=round(percentile(Value, 0.99),3), Min=round(min(Value),3), Max=round(max(Value),3) by Namespace, Name
| project-away Namespace

ContainerMemoryWorkingSetBytes
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster=="$Cluster"
| extend Namespace=tostring(Labels.namespace)
| extend Pod=tostring(Labels.pod)
| extend Container=tostring(Labels.container)
| where Namespace == "$Namespace"
| extend Value=Value
| summarize Value=max(Value) by bin(Timestamp, 60000ms), Namespace, Pod
| summarize Value=count() by Timestamp, Bin=bin(Value, 25e6), Namespace
| project Timestamp, tostring(Bin), Value
| order by Timestamp asc

ContainerMemoryWorkingSetBytes
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Labels !has "id"
| where Cluster=="$Cluster"
| extend Namespace=tostring(Labels.namespace)
| extend Pod=tostring(Labels.pod)
| extend Container=tostring(Labels.container)
| where Namespace == "$Namespace"
| extend Value=Value
| summarize Value=max(Value) by bin(Timestamp, $__timeInterval), Namespace, Pod
| extend Name=replace_regex(Pod, "(-[a-z0-9]{5})$", "")
| summarize Pods=dcount(Pod), P50=percentile(Value, 0.5), P99=percentile(Value, 0.99), Min=min(Value), Max=max(Value) by Namespace, Name
| project-away Namespace

ContainerNetworkReceiveBytesTotal
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster=="$Cluster"
| extend Namespace=tostring(Labels.namespace)
| extend Pod=tostring(Labels.pod)
| extend Container=tostring(Labels.container)
| where Namespace == "$Namespace"
| invoke prom_delta()
| extend Value=Value/60
| summarize Value=avg(Value) by bin(Timestamp, 60000ms), Namespace, Pod
| summarize Value=count() by Timestamp, Bin=bin(Value, 1024), Namespace
| project Timestamp, tostring(Bin), Value
| order by Timestamp asc
// | summarize Value=avg(Value)*-1 by bin(Timestamp, $__timeInterval), tostring(Labels.id), Pod
// | project Timestamp, Recieve=Value
// | order by Timestamp asc

ContainerNetworkTransmitBytesTotal
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster=="$Cluster"
| extend Namespace=tostring(Labels.namespace)
| extend Pod=tostring(Labels.pod)
| extend Container=tostring(Labels.container)
| where Namespace == "$Namespace"
| where Pod == "$Pod"
| invoke prom_delta()
| extend Value=Value/60
| summarize Value=avg(Value) by bin(Timestamp, $__timeInterval), tostring(Labels.id), Pod
| project Timestamp, Transmit=Value
| order by Timestamp asc

ContainerNetworkReceiveBytesTotal

| extend Namespace=tostring(Labels.namespace)

| summarize Pods=max(Count), P50=percentile(Value, 0.5), P99=percentile(Value, 0.99), Min=min(Value), Max=max(Value) by Namespace, Name
| project-away Namespace

list.definition:
ContainerCpuUserSecondsTotal
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster == "$Cluster"
| where Labels.namespace != ""
| distinct tostring(Labels.namespace)
list.name: Namespace

query.query:
ContainerCpuUserSecondsTotal
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster == "$Cluster"
| where Labels.namespace != ""
| distinct tostring(Labels.namespace)
